title: Bug 6125: JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When pressing 'Finish' on the JAR packager, the following error is displayed: 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'
OB: The JAR packager fails to create the JAR file when there are unsaved editors open.
EB: I expect to be able to create a JAR file even when there are unsaved editors. If there are unsaved changes, a dialog should prompt me to save them before proceeding.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Edit a file without saving it
2. Open the JAR packager for the respective project
3. Enter all the required information such as path, destination, name, and description of the JAR packager
4. Press 'Finish'
